Here, the gods use the fourth month of the year in heaven.
They experience the five earthly desires.
They are fully endowed with the associated pleasures of play.
Suppose we look at the sun and moon among humans.
It's 12,000 years.
The gods live 10 years and a third of their lives.
That's all that's used up in the garden.
These six parks of the Heaven of the Thirty-three are the largest.
There are also large and small parks.
They're spread all over heaven.
This is what the Bhagavān meant when he said.
'So I've heard.'
